Uses of Package
javax.microedition.sensor.control

Packages that use javax.microedition.sensor.control
javax.microedition.sensor.control This Mobile Sensor API package is optional and it enables the control of the sensor. 
 

Classes in javax.microedition.sensor.control used by javax.microedition.sensor.control
Control
          A Control object represents a sensor control enabling the sensor's control.
